Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; from Shum-........to the king of Egypt; 25 lines; right and left bottom corners are missing; writing is nearly defaced on the reverse.
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (272)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (80)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.176)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Condition: Fair; right and left bottom corners are missing; writing is nearly defaced on reverse.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
